headline.main: 'Heartless' U.S. Mortgage Modification Scheme Leads to 16-Year Prison Term
headline.print_headline: 'Heartless' U.S. Mortgage Modification Scheme Leads to 16-Year Prison Term

docs.snippet: A California man was sentenced on Thursday to 16 years in prison for his role in what prosecutors said was the largest mortgage modification scheme ever prosecuted, involving more than 30,000 homeowners defrauded out of $31 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: A California man was sentenced on Thursday to 16 years in prison for his role in what prosecutors said was the largest mortgage modification scheme ever prosecuted, involving more than 30,000 homeowners defrauded out of $31 million.

headline.main: US Interior Chief Tours Solar Plant on Tribal Land in Nevada
headline.print_headline: US Interior Chief Tours Solar Plant on Tribal Land in Nevada

docs.snippet: U.S. Interior Secretary Sally Jewell toured a vast solar energy array Thursday that's about ready to go online on an Indian reservation in Nevada, and signed an agreement with a tribal leader that gave a go-ahead for a similar plant nearby....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Interior Secretary Sally Jewell toured a vast solar energy array Thursday that's about ready to go online on an Indian reservation in Nevada, and signed an agreement with a tribal leader that gave a go-ahead for a similar plant nearby.

headline.main: Penn State Details Plan to Mark Joe Paterno's Debut; Alums
headline.print_headline: Penn State Details Plan to Mark Joe Paterno's Debut; Alums

docs.snippet: Penn State detailed plans Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of Joe Paterno's first win as hundreds of the late coach's former players made their way back to State College for a private reunion, marking a milestone that has emerged as a sensiti...
docs.lead_paragraph: Penn State detailed plans Thursday to mark the 50th anniversary of Joe Paterno's first win as hundreds of the late coach's former players made their way back to State College for a private reunion, marking a milestone that has emerged as a sensitive issue for the university and people critical of Paterno's role in the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse scandal.

headline.main: Oracle's Profit Forecast Misses Estimates; Shares Slip
headline.print_headline: Oracle's Profit Forecast Misses Estimates; Shares Slip

docs.snippet: Oracle Corp forecast lower-than-expected quarterly profit as growth in its cloud-based business fails to make up for weakness in its traditional software offerings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oracle Corp forecast lower-than-expected quarterly profit as growth in its cloud-based business fails to make up for weakness in its traditional software offerings.

headline.main: At Home With a Very Modern, Very Artistic Family
headline.print_headline: Home Life; A Very Modern, Very Artistic Family

docs.snippet: The filmmakers Ira Sachs and Kirsten Johnson, both of whom have movies out now, are co-parents to four-year-old twins — along with Sachs’s husband....
docs.lead_paragraph: The filmmakers Ira Sachs and Kirsten Johnson, both of whom have movies out now, are co-parents to four-year-old twins — along with Sachs’s husband.

headline.main: From Merkle to McNabb, a Look at a Few Famous Tie Games
headline.print_headline: From Merkle to McNabb, a Look at a Few Famous Tie Games

docs.snippet: Michigan State's 10-10 tie against Notre Dame in 1966 is a relic, part of an era before overtime came to college football....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan State's 10-10 tie against Notre Dame in 1966 is a relic, part of an era before overtime came to college football.

headline.main: University Teacher Lockout Ends; Contract Talks Continue
headline.print_headline: University Teacher Lockout Ends; Contract Talks Continue

docs.snippet: College students who began the year being taught by ill-prepared substitutes were back with their regular professors Thursday after Long Island University ended a faculty lockout at its Brooklyn campus caused by a bitter contract dispute....
docs.lead_paragraph: College students who began the year being taught by ill-prepared substitutes were back with their regular professors Thursday after Long Island University ended a faculty lockout at its Brooklyn campus caused by a bitter contract dispute.

headline.main: Ralph Lauren, Inspired by American West, Stops Traffic During Show
headline.print_headline: Ralph Lauren, Inspired by American West, Stops Traffic During Show

docs.snippet: Veteran fashion designer Ralph Lauren staged his first runway-to-retail show promoting his September collection, an American West-influenced affair that turned heads and stopped traffic on Madison Avenue during New York Fashion Week on Wednesday n...
docs.lead_paragraph: Veteran fashion designer Ralph Lauren staged his first runway-to-retail show promoting his September collection, an American West-influenced affair that turned heads and stopped traffic on Madison Avenue during New York Fashion Week on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Inter Stunned by Beer-Sheva, United Beaten by Feyenoord
headline.print_headline: Inter Stunned by Beer-Sheva, United Beaten by Feyenoord

docs.snippet: Three times European champions Inter Milan were stunned 2-0 at home by Israeli side Hapoel Beer-Sheva and Manchester United were floored by a late goal from Feyenoord as the Europa League group stage got underway on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three times European champions Inter Milan were stunned 2-0 at home by Israeli side Hapoel Beer-Sheva and Manchester United were floored by a late goal from Feyenoord as the Europa League group stage got underway on Thursday.

headline.main: Navigating Rio Can Be Tough for Those With Disabilities
headline.print_headline: Navigating Rio Can Be Tough for Those With Disabilities

docs.snippet: Inside the Olympic Park, there are ramps, strategically placed railings, tactile paving inside venues, and more. It's evident that experts designed the grounds for the Summer Games and Paralympics to be accessible to people with disabilities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Inside the Olympic Park, there are ramps, strategically placed railings, tactile paving inside venues, and more. It's evident that experts designed the grounds for the Summer Games and Paralympics to be accessible to people with disabilities.
